extension.summary: XBMC PVR addon for Imagenio Movistart
extension.description: IPTV PVR Client support streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources and EPG.
extension.disclaimer: This is unstable software The authors are in no way responsible for failed playings, incorrect EPG times, wasted hours, or any other undesirable effects.
Este software no es estable. No nos hacemos responsables de su correcto funcionamiento.
